attributes.action: to grant a posthumous knighthood to Fred Trueman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fred Trueman was the greatest English fast bowler in history. He gave many years' service to broadcasting and charity after his retirement from the game. He was a great character and wit, a patriot and real Yorkshireman. 

He was never adequately honoured during his lifetime, probably because he refused to be told what to do and say, and never gave a penny to New Labour.

The failure to honour Fred Trueman during his lifetime must be corrected now.

rejection.details: Sorry, we are no longer accepting posthumous honour requests as they are outside of the remit of the PM's office
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
